title: Daleks: invasion Earth 2150 A.D. [Widescreen]
brief_description: Based on a story from the BBC TV serial “Doctor Who”, Dr. Who and his companions arrive on Earth in the year 2150 AD, only to discover that the planet has been invaded and its population enslaved by the dreaded Daleks. The time travellers assist human resistance groups to foil the Daleks’ plan to mine the Earth’s core.
